item.title: 雅卡里诺退出 X 公司，马斯克找人灭火
item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日通讯。今天，库尔特-瓦格纳（Kurt Wagner）将报道琳达-雅卡里诺（Linda Yaccarino）辞去社交媒体平台 X 首席执行官一职的消息。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. item.title: 沙特王室经营着价值 2500 亿美元的公司，为巨额交易创造条件
item.description: 在沙特阿拉伯斥资数万亿美元重塑经济的同时，一个由王储弟弟监管的鲜为人知的投资集团正在成为关键的权力掮客。【原文：As Saudi Arabia spends trillions of dollars to reshape its economy, a little-known investment group overseen by the crown prince’s brother is emerging as a key power broker.】

item.title: 客户大举采购 IT 后，TCS 盈利超出预期
item.description: 塔塔咨询服务有限公司（Tata Consultancy Services Ltd.）公布的季度收益超过了分析师的预期，表明全球企业的技术支出正在复苏。【原文：Tata Consultancy Services Ltd. reported quarterly earnings that exceeded analysts’ estimates, signaling a revival in tech spending by global enterprises.】

item.title: 塞尔维亚再次维持利率不变，价格风险大于增长风险
item.description: 塞尔维亚连续第十个月维持借贷成本不变，即使在通胀率向巴尔干国家的目标迈进以及经济扩张在全球贸易风险和国内政治抗议活动的影响下放缓之后，仍保持了谨慎的立场。【原文：Serbia left borrowing costs unchanged for a 10th month, keeping a cautious stance even after inflation inched toward the Balkan nation’s target and economic expansion slowed amid global trade risks and political protests at home.】

item.title: 欧盟卡拉斯与以色列达成向加沙提供援助的协议
item.description: 据一位熟知内情的人士透露，欧盟和以色列已达成协议，允许向加沙提供更多援助，未来几天每天的供应量将大幅增加。【原文：The European Union and Israel have reached an agreement to allow more aid to Gaza, with a substantial increase of daily supplies to happen in the coming days, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 瑞银日本全球市场联席主管黑田东彦即将离职
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）日本全球市场联席主管黑田直弘（Naohiro Kuroda）将离开该行，知情人士称，在这位结构性投资业务老将吹嘘其团队扩张几个月后，他将离开该行。【原文：UBS Group AG’s Japan global markets co-head Naohiro Kuroda is leaving the bank, people with knowledge of the matter said, months after the veteran of structured investments business touted his team’s expansion.】

item.title: 欧盟推出人工智能规范，包括广泛的版权和透明度规则
item.description: 欧盟发布了一份业务守则，帮助企业遵守其具有里程碑意义的《人工智能法》，其中包括对创作者的版权保护和对先进模型的透明度要求。【原文：The European Union published a code of practice to help companies follow its landmark AI Act that includes copyright protections for creators and transparency requirements for advanced models.】

item.title: 埃及将第三次降息，原因是通胀放缓
item.description: 通胀放缓为埃及周四延长货币宽松周期提供了支持。【原文：A slowdown in inflation has bolstered the case for Egypt to extend its monetary-easing cycle on Thursday.】

item.title: 欧佩克强化石油需求将增长至 2050 年的离群观点
item.description: 石油输出国组织（OPEC）重申了其观点，即全球石油消耗量将持续增长到本世纪中叶。【原文：OPEC reinforced its view — an outlier even within the petroleum industry — that global oil consumption will keep increasing to the middle of the century.】

item.title: 财报在即，地区银行狂飙引来看跌押注
item.description: 一些华尔街策略师认为，美国地区性银行股的突破性反弹可能会让投资者失望，他们建议在财报季开始之际押注该行业的回调。【原文：A breakout rally in the shares of US regional banks may be setting investors up for disappointment, according to some Wall Street strategists, who recommend betting on a pullback in the sector as earnings season gets underway.】

item.title: 高盛认为欧佩克+将在下次会议后暂停增产
item.description: 据高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：The OPEC+ oil producer alliance is likely to make its next hike in collective output its last for a while, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 习近平发出信号：中国可能最终采取行动结束通货紧缩的价格战
item.description: 多年来，通货紧缩和伤痕累累的价格战一直困扰着中国大部分地区的经济，人们对此的担忧与日俱增，而习近平主席领导的政府正显示出最终采取行动的迹象。【原文：After years of mounting concern over deflation and the bruising price wars that have plagued much of China’s economy, President Xi Jinping’s government is showing signs of finally taking action.】

item.title: 中国对国产电动汽车的青睐阻碍了宝马汽车的销售
item.description: 由于欧洲汽车制造商在全球最大的电动汽车市场--中国继续被本土生产商击败，宝马汽车公司第二季度的销售停滞不前。【原文：BMW AG’s sales stagnated in the second quarter as European carmakers continued to lose ground to local producers in China, the world’s biggest electric-vehicle market.】

item.title: 印度东部邦选民名单修订引发法庭之争
item.description: 印度东部比哈尔邦决定在全邦大选前几个月对选民名单进行大规模修订，这一决定引发了该国最高法院的众多法律挑战，因为成千上万的选民有可能被剥夺选举权。【原文：A decision to undertake extensive revision of voter lists in the eastern Indian province of Bihar, months before a state-wide election, has prompted numerous legal challenges in the country’s Supreme Court as thousands risk getting disenfranchised.】

item.title: 迪拜房地产公司在国内掀起 70% 的热潮后转战迈阿密和悉尼
item.description: 迪拜的开发商们正在向海外扩张以寻求增长，此举有助于他们利用已积累的现金，并在国内经济可能放缓的情况下提供缓冲。【原文：Developers in Dubai are expanding abroad in search of growth, a move that helps them use the cash piles they’ve built up and offers a cushion in case of any potential slowdown at home.】

item.title: 泰晤士河水务公司拒绝同行提出的解决财务问题的最后建议
item.description: 泰晤士河水务公司在最后一刻拒绝了一位英国世袭贵族提出的解决其财务问题并避免国有化的建议，而是选择坚持债权人主导的救援计划。【原文：Thames Water dismissed a last-minute proposal from a British hereditary peer to fix its finances and fend off nationalization, opting instead to stick with the creditor-led rescue plan.】

item.title: 英国石油公司上游主管阐述扭亏为盈计划的机制
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP Plc）已将重振油气业务作为其扭亏为盈计划的核心，上游业务主管戈登-伯瑞尔（Gordon Birrell）正牵头推动该业务成为更可靠的利润驱动力。【原文：BP Plc has put an oil and gas revival at the heart of its turnaround plan, and upstream chief Gordon Birrell is leading the push to make the business a more reliable driver of profits.】

item.title: 据说阿斯特化学公司正在洽谈收购埃克森新加坡加油站的事宜
item.description: 据知情人士透露，印尼 Chandra Asri 集团与全球大宗商品交易商嘉能可集团（Glencore Plc）的合资企业 Aster Chemicals and Energy Pte 正在洽谈收购石油巨头埃克森美孚公司在新加坡的加油站。【原文：Aster Chemicals and Energy Pte, a joint venture between Indonesia’s Chandra Asri Group and global commodities trader Glencore Plc, is in talks to buy oil major Exxon Mobil Corp.’s gas stations in Singapore, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 英伟达黄仁勋将与中国领导人会晤，人工智能限制加深
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）联合创始人黄仁勋下周将在北京会见中国高级官员，这标志着该公司对华盛顿日益寻求孤立的广阔市场的承诺。【原文：Nvidia Corp. co-founder Jensen Huang will meet with senior Chinese officials in Beijing next week, signaling the company’s commitment to a vast market Washington is increasingly seeking to isolate.】

item.title: 马云支持的蚂蚁金服将把 Circle 的稳定币纳入全球平台
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，马云支持的蚂蚁金服集团公司正在与Circle Internet Group Inc.合作，在这家中国金融科技公司的区块链平台上采用其稳定币。【原文：Jack Ma-backed Ant Group Co. is working with Circle Internet Group Inc. to adopt its stablecoin on the Chinese fintech company’s blockchain platform, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 曼尼帕尔医院从加拿大 OTPP 公司以 7 亿美元收购 Sahyadri 公司
item.description: Manipal Health Enterprises Pvt. 公司以约 7 亿美元的价格收购了 Sahyadri 医院的多数股权，为印度的医疗保健交易再添一笔，并对阿波罗医院企业有限公司（Apollo Hospitals Enterprise Ltd.）的主导地位构成挑战。【原文：Manipal Health Enterprises Pvt. has acquired a majority stake in Sahyadri Hospitals for about $700 million, adding to a flurry of health care deals in India and challenging the dominance of Apollo Hospitals Enterprise Ltd.】

item.title: 乐天聘请银行发行约 10 亿美元日元债券

item.title: 据说 SBI 计划最早下周出售 29 亿美元股票
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度资产规模最大的贷款机构印度国家银行正准备最快于下周向机构投资者出售高达 2,500 亿卢比（约合 29 亿美元）的股票，这可能是印度最大的同类交易。【原文：State Bank of India, the country’s largest lender by assets, is preparing to sell as much as 250 billion rupees ($2.9 billion) of shares to institutional investors as soon as next week, according to people familiar with the matter, in what could be the nation’s biggest deal of its kind.】
